name: Rodent Selection
description:
A game about breeding colorful rodents!  Eliminate noncompliant rodents in order to create a rodent collection balanced across a set of three target colors.  Can you keep the situation under control?

This game is best played with a mouse.  (The rodents in the game don't count.)  This game relies somewhat heavily on colors.

Rodent Selection was created in less than 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2020.  Also, this was my first time using Kotlin's JS backend, which worked out well, at least for this simple (standard library only) use case.  I would definitely use Kotlin and WebGL together again in the future.
